page.title: 15Religion/Newton area contd
page.content: visited Rectory as a child. Dr Arnold of Rugby married Mary daughter of John Penrose, vicar. John Keble came to Fledborough to conduct burial service of John Penrose. Ragnall - Church of St Leonard C19 Services fortnightly. Average congregation 3.{ {Methodism}Newton on Trent Chapel 1895 Society Steward Edgar Kyme - Village postmaster. In Lincoln circuit under the care of the Minister of Saxilby. Services fortnightly in the afternoon Average congregation 14 increasing. {Buddhism} North Clifton The Pure Land Meditation Centre was set up in 1975 by Buddha Maitreya the Enlightened One. Financed by his parents he came from Japan to introduce Meditation Techniques and to teach Buddhist Philosophy of non-violence. Meditation classes and weekend retreats at his home.Created a typical Japanese garden
